location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Messrs Remington

mods.abstract: Brief note regarding 2,000 rupees from the Government treasury to be credited to Pelly's account; the realisation of his seventy-two shares in the New Bank of Bombay and his ten shares in the Elphinstone Land Company.Below the note is a brief list of letters and notes to be written, the recipients for these being Narayn Wassadeojee, Coyle & Co, William Mackinnon, Michael John Maxwell Shaw-Stewart and William Lockyer Merewether.
